milestones.description: Minhajul Abedin has become the top scorer for BAN in ODIs with 116 runs, going past Aminul Islam's 108
Faruque Ahmed's 57 is the highest individual score in ODIs (for BAN), surpassing Azhar Hossain's 54
This is the highest match aggregate (341) involving teams India & Bangladesh in ODIs
Athar Ali Khan has broken the record for most runs in boundaries (24) in an innings in ODIs for BAN, going past Azhar Hossain's 16
Gholam Nousher has broken the record for playing the most ODIs (8) for BAN, going past Gazi Ashraf
Athar Ali Khan and Faruque Ahmed's 108-run partnership is BAN's highest for any wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 52 between Akram Khan and Azhar Hossain
Athar Ali Khan and Faruque Ahmed's 108-run partnership is BAN's highest for the 3rd wicket in ODIs, breaking the record of 52 between Azhar Hossain and Akram Khan
